comments.author: isingrel.2350
comments.body: They’re listed by the equipment and inventory for beta characters, speaking of which, is there a beta character slot flag?

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
AFAIK they’re not finalized.

They haven’t been acquired by a “real” account yet, so they’re not showing up anywhere on my radar.

comments.author: isingrel.2350
comments.body: Is it possible to get the items available as part of the Revenant beta characters blessed for display or are they not finalized?
